item.title: 脚本与配置
item.author: Oasis
item.description: 自动更新域名SSL证书脚本 #!/bin/bash rm -rf ~/.acme.sh echo "Clear acme" wget -O - https://get.acme.sh | sh cd ~/.acme.sh/ echo "Download acme" sh acme.sh --upgrade --auto-upgrade echo "Set acme auto upgrade" sh acme.sh --issue --server letsencrypt --test -d halfstack.net -w /home/summer/www/webpage --keylength ec-256 echo "Test Generate Cert" sh acme.sh --set-default-ca --server letsencrypt echo "Change Default CA" sh acme.sh --issue -d halfstack.net
